basics.label: Passenger Services Officer
basics.summary: A hard working and self-motivated Australian professional willing to learn and develop new skills. I am a dedicated, organised and methodical individual. I have good interpersonal skills, am an excellent team worker with an active and dynamic approach to work. I am flexible, reliable and possess excellent time keeping skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Complete Systems training: Amadeus Altea Customer Management System, Complete Product Training: Singapore Airlines
highlights: Checked in an average of 60 passengers per check-in
Demonstrating an in-depth knowledge of key health and safety standards used within the industry
Dispatching flights on time which included overseeing the boarding of the aircraft

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Complete Systems training: Galileo Reservations, Universal Desktop, Client Management and accounting, Complete Product training: Customer sales process
highlights: Being a team player by coaching colleagues on the sales process to reach store revenue targets

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Corporate Travel Manager / Staff Developer and Trainer
work.summary: Assisting with on the job sales, product and systems training for new staff members. Developing staff in core competences to ensure success.
highlights: Negotiating corporate and best rates with hotels
Complying with all relevant laws and travel business legislation

education.area: Physics, Mathematical Methods, English Literature, English Mainstream, Chemistry and Biology
